events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering team to proceed with the next steps.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to guide you through the process.
We completed an initial screening call to discuss your background and technical experience in software engineering.
Thank you for the detailed information shared during the screening; we appreciate your prompt response.
Your technical interview for the Software Engineer role has been scheduled for May 16th at 10:00 AM UTC.
The technical interview concluded successfully with positive feedback on your coding and problem-solving skills.
We are pleased to offer you the Software Engineer position with a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
The offer has been formally accepted by you, and we look forward to your onboarding start date.
Your onboarding process has officially started with introductions to the team and initial setup tasks.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position is now closed successfully with you joining our company.
